trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for strongly typed connection string builders.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base para conexão fortemente tipado construtores de cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: The DbConnectionStringBuilder class provides the base class from which the strongly typed connection string builders (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder>, and so on) derive.
trans-unit.target: A classe DbConnectionStringBuilder fornece a classe base da qual a conexão fortemente tipado string construtores (<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder>e assim por diante) derivar.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The connection string builders let developers programmatically create syntactically correct connection strings, and parse and rebuild existing connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Os construtores de cadeia de caracteres de conexão permitem que os desenvolvedores programaticamente criar cadeias de caracteres de conexão sintaticamente correto e analisar e recriar as cadeias de caracteres de conexão existente.

trans-unit.source: The DbConnectionStringBuilder has been defined in a database-agnostic manner.
trans-unit.target: O DbConnectionStringBuilder foi definido de forma independente do banco de dados.

trans-unit.source: Because of the addition of the <xref:System.Data.Common> namespace, developers require a base class against which they can program in order to build connection strings that can work against an arbitrary database.
trans-unit.target: Devido à adição do <xref:System.Data.Common>namespace, os desenvolvedores exigem uma classe base em relação à qual pode programar para criar cadeias de caracteres de conexão que funcionem em um banco de dados arbitrário.</xref:System.Data.Common>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the DbConnectionStringBuilder class lets users assign arbitrary key/value pairs and pass the resulting connection string to a strongly typed provider.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, a classe DbConnectionStringBuilder permite aos usuários atribuir pares chave/valor arbitrário e passe a cadeia de conexão resultante para um provedor com rigidez de tipos.

trans-unit.source: All the data providers that are included as part of the .NET Framework provide a strongly typed class that inherits from DbConnectionStringBuilder: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder>, and <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Todos os provedores de dados que são incluídos como parte do .NET Framework fornecem uma classe fortemente tipada que herda de DbConnectionStringBuilder: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder>, <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder>e <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The developer can build, assign, and edit connection strings for any arbitrary provider.
trans-unit.target: O desenvolvedor pode criar, atribuir e editar cadeias de caracteres de conexão para qualquer provedor arbitrário.

trans-unit.source: For providers that support specific key/value pairs, the connection string builder provides strongly typed properties corresponding to the known pairs.
trans-unit.target: Para provedores que dão suporte a pares chave/valor específico, o construtor de cadeia de caracteres de conexão fornece propriedades com rigidez de tipos correspondentes para os pares.

trans-unit.source: In order to support providers that require the ability to support unknown values, developers can also supply arbitrary key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: Para oferecer suporte a provedores que exigem a capacidade de dar suporte a valores desconhecidos, os desenvolvedores também podem fornecer pares chave/valor arbitrário.

trans-unit.source: The DbConnectionStringBuilder class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor> interface.
trans-unit.target: A classe implementa DbConnectionStringBuilder o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: This means that the class works with Visual Studio designers at design time.
trans-unit.target: Isso significa que a classe funciona com designers do Visual Studio em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: When developers use the designer to build strongly typed DataSets and strongly typed connections within Visual Studio, the strongly typed connection string builder class will display the properties associated with its type and will also have converters that can map common values for known keys.
trans-unit.target: Quando os desenvolvedores de usam o designer para criar conjuntos de dados com rigidez de tipos e conexões com rigidez de tipos no Visual Studio, a classe de construtor de cadeia de caracteres de conexão fortemente tipados exibirá as propriedades associadas ao seu tipo e também terá conversores que podem ser mapeados valores comuns para chaves conhecidos.

trans-unit.source: Developers needing to create connection strings as part of applications can use the DbConnectionStringBuilder class or one of its strongly typed derivatives to build and modify connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores que precisam criar cadeias de caracteres de conexão como parte dos aplicativos podem usar a classe DbConnectionStringBuilder ou um de seus com rigidez de tipos derivados para criar e modificar cadeias de caracteres de conexão.

trans-unit.source: The DbConnectionStringBuilder class also makes it easy to manage connection strings stored in an application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: A classe DbConnectionStringBuilder também torna fácil de gerenciar cadeias de caracteres de conexão armazenadas em um arquivo de configuração do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Developers can create connection strings using either a strongly typed connection string builder class, or they can use the DbConnectionStringBuilder class.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores podem criar cadeias de caracteres de conexão usando a uma classe de construtor cadeia de caracteres com rigidez de tipos de conexão, ou eles podem usar a classe DbConnectionStringBuilder.

trans-unit.source: The DbConnectionStringBuilder performs no checks for valid key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: O DbConnectionStringBuilder não fará verificações de pares chave/valor válido.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is possible using this class to create invalid connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, é possível usar essa classe para criar cadeias de caracteres de conexão inválido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder> supports only key/value pairs that are supported by SQL Server; trying to add invalid pairs will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>suporta apenas pares chave/valor que são suportadas pelo SQL Server; tentando adicionar pares inválidos lançará uma exceção.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Add%2A> method and <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> property handle tries to insert malicious entries.
trans-unit.target: Tanto o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Add%2A>método e <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>identificador de propriedade tenta inserir entradas mal-intencionado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code correctly escapes the nested key/value pair: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim builder As New System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder builder("Data Source") = "(local)" builder("integrated sSecurity") = True builder("Initial Catalog") = "AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad" ``` [C#] ``` System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder(); builder["Data Source"] = "(local)"; builder["integrated Security"] = true; builder["Initial Catalog"] = "AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad"; ``` The result is the following connection string that handles the invalid value in a safe manner: ``` data source=(local);integrated security=True; initial catalog="AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad" ```
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o código a seguir ignora corretamente o par chave/valor aninhada: [Visual Basic] ``` Dim builder As New System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder builder("Data Source") = "(local)" builder("integrated sSecurity") = True builder("Initial Catalog") = "AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad" ``` [c#] ``` System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder builder = new System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder(); builder["Data Source"] = "(local)"; builder["integrated Security"] = true; builder["Initial Catalog"] = "AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad"; ``` o resultado é a seguinte cadeia de conexão que trata o valor inválido de maneira segura:``` data source=(local);integrated security=True; initial catalog="AdventureWorks;NewValue=Bad" ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> class, optionally using ODBC rules for quoting values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> classe, opcionalmente usando regras ODBC para delimitar valores.

trans-unit.source: If `useOdbcRules` is `true`, this <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> uses ODBC rules for quoting values (surrounding values with curly braces ({})).
trans-unit.target: Se `useOdbcRules` é `true`, este <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>usa regras ODBC para delimitar valores (ao redor valores com chaves ({})).</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: If `useOdbcRules` is `false`, this <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> uses quotation mark character ("") to delimit values.
trans-unit.target: Se `useOdbcRules` é `false`, este <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>usa o caractere de aspas ("") para delimitar valores.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use {} to delimit fields; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to use quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para usar {} para delimitar campos; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> usar aspas.

trans-unit.source: Adds an entry with the specified key and value into the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma entrada com a chave especificada e o valor para o <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A> property can also be used to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>propriedade também pode ser usada para adicionar novos elementos, definindo o valor de uma chave que não existe no dicionário.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example: `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo: `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`.

trans-unit.source: Calling the Add method by passing a null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) key throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o método Add, passando um valor nulo (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) chave lança um <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>.</xref:System.ArgumentNullException>

trans-unit.source: However, calling the Add method by passing a null value removes the key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, chamar o método Add, passando um valor nulo remove o par chave/valor.

trans-unit.source: The key to add to the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A chave a ser adicionada para o <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value for the specified key.
trans-unit.target: O valor para a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: keyword is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: keywordé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: - ou - <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> tem um tamanho fixo.

trans-unit.source: Provides an efficient and safe way to append a key and value to an existing <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma maneira eficiente e segura para acrescentar uma chave e valor a um existente <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>objeto.</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This method allows developers using a <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> to create a collection of key/value pairs to be able to take advantage of the features included in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> class when you add key/value pairs, without having to incur the overhead of creating and maintaining a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> instance.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que os desenvolvedores que usam um <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>para criar uma coleção de pares chave/valor para ser capaz de aproveitar os recursos incluídos no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>classe quando você adicionar pares de chave/valor, sem precisar incorrer em sobrecarga de criar e manter um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>instância.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The `AppendKeyValuePair` method formats the key and value correctly and adds the new string to the supplied <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: O `AppendKeyValuePair` método formata a chave e valor corretamente e adiciona a nova cadeia de caracteres fornecido <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>.</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> to which to add the key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>ao qual adicionar o par chave/valor.</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The key to be added.
trans-unit.target: A chave a ser adicionada.

trans-unit.source: The value for the supplied key.
trans-unit.target: O valor para a chave fornecida.

trans-unit.source: Provides an efficient and safe way to append a key and value to an existing <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma maneira eficiente e segura para acrescentar uma chave e valor a um existente <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>objeto.</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This method allows developers using a <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> to create a collection of key/value pairs to be able to take advantage of the features included in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> class when adding key/value pairs, without having to incur the overhead of creating and maintaining a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> instance.
trans-unit.target: Esse método permite que os desenvolvedores que usam um <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>para criar uma coleção de pares chave/valor para ser capaz de aproveitar os recursos incluídos no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>classe ao adicionar pares de chave/valor, sem precisar incorrer em sobrecarga de criar e manter um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>instância.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The `AppendKeyValuePair` method formats the key and value correctly and adds the new string to the supplied <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: O `AppendKeyValuePair` método formata a chave e valor corretamente e adiciona a nova cadeia de caracteres fornecido <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>.</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Although most data sources let you delimit fields by using quotation marks, ODBC does not--for ODBC connection strings, you must use curly braces ({}).
trans-unit.target: Embora a maioria das fontes de dados permitem que você delimitar campos usando aspas, ODBC não – para cadeias de caracteres de conexão ODBC, você deve usar as chaves ({}).

trans-unit.source: In order to have the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> use ODBC rules for delimiting fields, set the `useOdbcRules` parameter to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para ter o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>usar regras ODBC para campos de delimitação, defina o `useOdbcRules` parâmetro para `true`.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder> to which to add the key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>ao qual adicionar o par chave/valor.</xref:System.Text.StringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The key to be added.
trans-unit.target: A chave a ser adicionada.

trans-unit.source: The value for the supplied key.
trans-unit.target: O valor para a chave fornecida.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use {} to delimit fields, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to use quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para usar {} para delimitar campos, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> usar aspas.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*> property is visible in Visual Studio designers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*>propriedade está visível na designers do Visual Studio.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*>

trans-unit.source: Developers creating designers that take advantage of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> class must be able to make the connection string visible or invisible within the designer's property grid.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores que criam designers que aproveitam o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>classe deve ser capaz de fazer a cadeia de caracteres de conexão visível ou invisível na grade de propriedade do designer.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The BrowsableConnectionString property lets developers indicate that the property should be invisible by setting the property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade BrowsableConnectionString permite que os desenvolvedores indicam que a propriedade deve ser invisível definindo a propriedade como `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the connection string is visible within designers; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a cadeia de caracteres de conexão é visível em designers; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Clears the contents of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Limpa o conteúdo do <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The Clear method removes all key/value pairs from the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> and resets all corresponding properties.
trans-unit.target: O método Clear remove todos os pares chave/valor da <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>e redefine todas as propriedades correspondentes.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This includes setting the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Count%2A> property to 0 and the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString%2A> property to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Isso inclui a configuração de <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Count%2A>propriedade como 0 e o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString%2A>propriedade como uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> objects on the associated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Limpa a coleção de <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> objetos associados <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is used by designers to clear all associated property descriptors on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado por designers para limpar todos os descritores de propriedade associada em <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the connection string associated with the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cadeia de conexão associada a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property returns a semicolon-delimited list of key/value pairs stored within the collection maintained by the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade retorna uma lista separada por ponto-e-vírgula de pares chave/valor armazenado dentro da coleção mantida pelo <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Each pair contains the key and value, separated by an equal sign.
trans-unit.target: Cada par contém a chave e valor, separados por um sinal de igual.

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates a typical connection string.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir ilustra uma cadeia de caracteres de conexão típica.

trans-unit.source: ``` "Persist Security Info=False;Integrated Security=SSPI;Initial Catalog=AdventureWorks;Data Source=(local)" ``` Data providers may expect specific keys and values for each connection string property.
trans-unit.target: ``` "Persist Security Info=False;Integrated Security=SSPI;Initial Catalog=AdventureWorks;Data Source=(local)" ```Provedores de dados podem esperar que as chaves específicas e valores para cada propriedade de cadeia de caracteres de conexão.

trans-unit.source: , These values are documented individually.
trans-unit.target: , Esses valores são documentados individualmente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> class does not validate the key/value pairs associated with its connection string, although classes that inherit from it can.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>classe não validar os pares chave/valor associados a sua cadeia de caracteres de conexão, embora as classes que herdam dele inst</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The ConnectionString property of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> class acts generally as a mechanism for creating and parsing semicolon-delimited lists of key/value pairs separated with equal signs.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ConnectionString do <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>classe geralmente funciona como um mecanismo para criar e analisar a lista separada por ponto-e-vírgula de pares chave/valor separados por sinais de igual.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: It provides no validation or other support specific to connection strings.
trans-unit.target: Ele fornece nenhuma validação ou outro suporte específico para cadeias de caracteres de conexão.

trans-unit.source: If you add items to the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> collection, the ConnectionString property will reflect the changes.
trans-unit.target: Se você adicionar itens para o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>coleção, a propriedade ConnectionString refletirá as alterações.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: If you assign a value to the ConnectionString property, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> will try to parse the value, using the semicolon and equal-sign delimiters.
trans-unit.target: Se você atribuir um valor à propriedade ConnectionString a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>tentará analisar o valor, usando os delimitadores ponto e vírgula e o sinal de igual.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The current connection string, created from the key/value pairs that are contained within the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de conexão atual, criada a partir de pares chave/valor contidos o <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: An invalid connection string argument has been supplied.
trans-unit.target: Um argumento de cadeia de caracteres de conexão inválido foi fornecido.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> contains a specific key.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> contém uma chave específica.

trans-unit.source: The key to locate in the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A chave a ser localizado no <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Compares the connection information in this <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> object with the connection information in the supplied object.
trans-unit.target: Compara as informações de conexão neste <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> objeto com as informações de conexão no objeto fornecido.

trans-unit.source: Comparisons on key names are case insensitive; value comparisons are case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: Comparações de nomes de chave diferenciam maiusculas de minúsculas; comparações de valor diferenciam maiusculas de minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: The EquivalentTo method returns `true` if the key/value pairs are equal, regardless of their order.
trans-unit.target: O método EquivalentTo retorna `true` se os pares chave/valor são iguais, independentemente de sua ordem.

trans-unit.source: The connection behavior of the two connection strings are equivalent, because order is never significant within connection strings.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento de conexão das cadeias de caracteres de duas conexão são equivalentes, pois o pedido nunca significativo em cadeias de caracteres de conexão.

trans-unit.source: However, different order may affect connection pooling behavior of connections based on these connection strings.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, outra ordem pode afetar o comportamento de conexões com base nessas cadeias de caracteres de conexão do pool de conexão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> to be compared with this <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> a ser comparado com esse <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the connection information in both of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> objects causes an equivalent connection string; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as informações de conexão em ambos os <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> objetos faz com que uma cadeia de caracteres de conexão equivalentes; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> tem um tamanho fixo.

trans-unit.source: A fixed-size collection does not allow adding or removing elements after the collection is created, but it does allow modifying existing elements.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de tamanho fixo não permite adição ou remoção de elementos após a criação da coleção, mas permite a modificação de elementos existentes.

trans-unit.source: A fixed-size collection is just a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including adding or removing elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de tamanho fixo é apenas uma coleção com um wrapper que impede a adição e remoção de elementos; Portanto, se forem feitas alterações à coleção subjacente, incluindo adição ou remoção de elementos, a coleção de tamanho fixo reflete as alterações.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> has a fixed size; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> tem um fixa tamanho; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection does not allow adding, removing, or modifying elements after the collection is created.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção somente leitura não permite adição, remoção ou modificação de elementos após a criação da coleção.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection is just a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção somente leitura é apenas uma coleção com um wrapper que impede a modificação da coleção; Portanto, se forem feitas alterações à coleção subjacente, a coleção somente leitura reflete as alterações.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref> is read-only; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref> é somente leitura; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value associated with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor associado com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, the value is replaced; otherwise, a new element is created.
trans-unit.target: Quando você definir essa propriedade, se a chave especificada já existe no dicionário, o valor será substituído; Caso contrário, um novo elemento é criado.

trans-unit.source: The key of the item to get or set.
trans-unit.target: A chave do item a ser obtido ou definido.

trans-unit.source: The value associated with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: O valor associado com a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: If the specified key is not found, trying to get it returns a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic), and trying to set it creates a new element using the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Se a chave especificada não for encontrada, tentando fazê-lo retorna uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic), e tentar defini-lo cria um novo elemento usando a chave especificada.

trans-unit.source: Passing a null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) key throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>.
trans-unit.target: Passando um valor nulo (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> no Visual Basic) chave lança um <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>.</xref:System.ArgumentNullException>

trans-unit.target: Atribuindo um valor nulo remove o par chave/valor.

trans-unit.source: The order of the values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> returned by the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A ordem dos valores no <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>não for especificado, mas é a mesma ordem que os valores associados no <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>retornado pelo <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Values%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is not a static copy; instead, the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> refers back to the keys in the original <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Retornado <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>não é uma cópia estática; em vez disso, o que <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>faz referência a chaves no original <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, changes to the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> are reflected in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, as alterações que <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>são refletidas em <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Because the Remove method returns a value that indicates its success, it is not required to look for the key before trying to remove the key/value pair from the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> instance.
trans-unit.target: Como o método Remove retorna um valor que indica o sucesso, não é necessário para procurar a chave antes de tentar remover o par chave/valor da <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>instância.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*> property.
trans-unit.target: Atual <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString*>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value corresponding to the supplied key from this <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Recupera um valor correspondente para a chave fornecida neste <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The TryGetValue method lets developers safely retrieve a value from a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> without needing to first call the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método TryGetValue permite que os desenvolvedores recuperar com segurança um valor de um <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>sem precisar primeiro chamar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey%2A>método.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.ContainsKey%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Because TryGetValue does not raise an exception when you call it, passing in a nonexistent key, you do not have to look for a key before retrieving its value.
trans-unit.target: Porque TryGetValue não gera uma exceção ao chamar, passando uma chave que não existe, não é necessário que procurar uma chave antes de recuperar seu valor.

trans-unit.source: Calling TryGetValue with a nonexistent key will place the null value (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) in the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Chamando TryGetValue com uma chave inexistente colocará o valor nulo (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) no `value` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The key of the item to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: A chave do item a ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: The value corresponding to the `key`.
trans-unit.target: O valor correspondente para o `key`.

trans-unit.source: if keyword was found within the connection string, otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Se keyword foi encontrado na cadeia de conexão, caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: keyword contains a null value ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: keywordcontém um valor nulo ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the values in the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>que contém os valores de <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The order of the values in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated keys in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> returned by the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A ordem dos valores no <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>não for especificado, mas é a mesma ordem que as chaves associadas no <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>retornado pelo <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys%2A>método.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder.Keys%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is not a static copy; instead, the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> refers back to the values in the original <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Retornado <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>não é uma cópia estática; em vez disso, o que <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>faz referência a valores no original <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, changes to the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder> are reflected in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, as alterações que <xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>são refletidas em <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> that contains the values in the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>que contém os valores de <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder"> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>
